typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(mynewcol = toString(toTimestamp('2011-11-14T18:30:02.000Z','yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'H:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\''), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'H:mm:ss.SSS'),
		mynewcol2 = toString(toTimestamp('12/31/2016T00:12:00', 'MM/dd/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), 'MM/ dd /yyyy\'T\' HH:mm:ss')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink() ~> sink1
